document.full_text: american david toms rebounded from his playoff loss at last week's players championship in sizzling style as he charged into a share of the lead at the colonial invitational on thursday.
document.title: toms forgets players woes with fast colonial start
lines_and_colors: american david toms rebounded from his playoff loss at last week's players championship in sizzling style as he charged into a share of the lead at the colonial invitational on thursday.
